      • addFile

        public void addFile​(File file,
                    int baseLen)
        Adding a file for ResourceManager.fromDir(File). The identifier is derived from removing baseLen characters from the front of the string. THE USER SHOULD NEVER CALL THIS FUNCTION!
        Overrides:
        addFile in class ResourceManager
        Parameters:
        file - File to add
        baseLen - Length of root. (To be removed to get the identifier)

      • getImages

        Returns:
        HashMap of all images
